gov.nih.nlm.meme.sql
Class EnhancedConnection

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.meme.sql.EnhancedConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
Direct Known Subclasses:
MEMEConnection
public class EnhancedConnection
extends Object
implements Connection

Enhanced version of the Connection implementation in the java.sql package. It has the same functionality except that the that the setAutoCommit(boolean) method has "memory". In addition, there are restoreAutoCommit() and resetAutoCommit() methods which bring back or reset the auto commit memory. It contains some additional methods to handle CLOBs, a data type used for character strings which could be longer than 4KB. These methods use the oracle.sql package.

Author:
MEME Group
See Also:
Connection

Field Summary
protected static int clob_insert_length
          clob_insert_length: 4K is the limit of data to insert in a CLOB at once.
protected  Stack hash_area_stack
           
protected static int max_int
          max_int is a little smaller than the biggest int, so if a CLOB has length bigger than max_int, we get it in pieces of length max_int.
protected  Stack sort_area_stack

Method Detail

getClobAsString

public String getClobAsString(oracle.sql.CLOB clob)
                       throws DataSourceException
Given a ResultSet and a column_name this methods returns a String representation of the data stored in this Clob if the column contains CLOB values in the database.

Parameters:
clob - the CLOB representation of clob.
Returns:
the String representation of converted clob.
Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to convert clob as string.

getClobAsReader

public BufferedReader getClobAsReader(oracle.sql.CLOB clob)
                               throws DataSourceException
Given a ResultSet and a column_name this methods returns a BufferedReader containing the data stored in this Clob if the column contains CLOB values in the database.

Parameters:
clob - the CLOB representation of clob.
Returns:
the BufferedReader representation of buffered reader.
Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to convert clob to buffer reader.

setClob

public void setClob(oracle.sql.CLOB clob,
                    String data)
             throws DataSourceException
Given a ResultSet rset this method insert the data in this "row" of rset and in the column with number columnnumber, if this column stores Clob values.

Parameters:
clob - the CLOB representation of clob.
data - the String representation of data string.
Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to write data into clob.

setAutoCommit

public void setAutoCommit(boolean auto_commit)
                   throws SQLException
Works similar to the Connection.setAutoCommit() method, except that the previous state is stored and can be restored using the restoreAutoCommit() method.

Specified by:
setAutoCommit in interface Connection
Parameters:
auto_commit - A boolean representation of auto commit.
Throws:
SQLException - if failed to set auto commit.

restoreAutoCommit

public void restoreAutoCommit()
                       throws DataSourceException
Restores the auto commit mode set before the last setAutoCommit() call. Should not be used more times than the setAutoCommit method.

Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to restore auto commit.

resetAutoCommit

public void resetAutoCommit()
                     throws DataSourceException
Deletes the memory of the setAutoCommit() method and resets the auto_commit mode to the state it had at the beginning.

Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to reset auto commit.

enableBuffer

public void enableBuffer()
                  throws DataSourceException
Creates a database buffer of size 10000.

Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to enable buffer.

Parameters:
size - buffer size
Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to enable buffer.

flushBuffer

public String flushBuffer()
                   throws DataSourceException
Flushes the database buffer to MEMEToolkit.trace(). So the information stored in the database buffer can be seen from a Java program.

Returns:
the String representation of buffered string.
Throws:
DataSourceException - if failed to flush buffer.

Determines if session is still active.

Returns:
true if session is still active; false otherwise.
